name: Hitmonchan

passive.name: One-Two Punch
passive.effect: When this Pokemon attacks, it may attack twice. If it attacks with a TM, that attack does half damage (rounded down).

attacks.name: Feint
attacks.effect: Put a damage counter on the Defending Pokemon.

attacks.name: Elemental Cross
attacks.effect: Treat this attack's damage as any Energy attached to this Pokemon.

attacks.name: Uppercut
attacks.effect: You can only use one Uppercut per turn. If this attack Knocks Out the Defending Pokemon, draw 2 cards.

flavor: Training never stops for these champs: Their punches come fast after thousands of hours of honing their skills.
